title: Post-Industrial Communities
prompt: A weathered main street storefront with darkened windows and faded signage, photographed from across the street in soft morning light, with an empty parking lot and bare trees visible. In the foreground, a person's hands rest on a wooden porch railing, overlooking the quiet streetâ€”shot from behind to preserve anonymity. The muted palette of grey concrete, aged brick, and golden-hour shadows conveys both the texture of abandonment and the quiet persistence of those who remain, with documentary photojournalism clarity and no sentimentality.
